channel.title: More help with npc drops
channel.description:
I got my monsters to drop thx again for the help folks..
but does anyone know i code so it can drop one item at a time but have more thna one item it can drop?
for example i want a green dragon to drop rune legs or a rune chain but it will only drop both at once... Can anyone help me out? ;D
